first_para: Naomi Long MP (born 13 December 1971) is a Northern Irish politician. She is a member of the Alliance Party of Northern Ireland and currently its deputy leader. She represents Belfast East in the United Kingdom House of Commons, and previously represented the same constituency in the Northern Ireland Assembly. She served as the second elected female Lord Mayor of Belfast (2009–10).

full.extract: Naomi Long MP (born 13 December 1971) is a Northern Irish politician. She is a member of the Alliance Party of Northern Ireland and currently its deputy leader. She represents Belfast East in the United Kingdom House of Commons, and previously represented the same constituency in the Northern Ireland Assembly. She served as the second elected female Lord Mayor of Belfast (2009–10).
full.title: Naomi Long
